Posts.Content: I have had no diarrhea or stomach problems at all on 50mg. I’ll have my labs Wednesday back after first month on it.
Posts.Title: Verzenio minimum effective dose

Posts.Content: I have the same ideas about minimum effective dose and chose to start Verzenio at 50mg so appreciate the info here. Since I’ve onky been on it one month and my labs are next week, I have no input on efficacy. Thanks for starting the thread. I wish us all well!
Posts.Title: Verzenio minimum effective dose

Posts.Content: I was on Ibrance for 5 months in 2016. I did not stop due to progression, but due to my concern about known and unknown side effects. I try to minimize meds whenever possible. I was on the lowest 75mg dose Ibrance. It took me into NEAD where I remained for over a year. Now tumor markers are rising and cancer is again active. I am oligometastatic in just my sternum. I'm trying Verzenio since it is said to affect WBC less and hoping for the best
